channel.title: Transformation on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Transformation on Alex's Blog

item.title: Beyond the Plateau: My Running Transformation Results
item.description: In my previous posts, I explained how I was stuck in the Running Plateau and the science-based training approach that helped me break through it. I detailed the principles of zone-based training, proper recovery, strategic intervals, and structured periodization that formed the foundation of my new approach.
